TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XamlDeferringLoader extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示加载和返回延迟内容的 XAML 读取器行为。

span.span: Represents a XAML reader behavior that loads and returns deferred content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类不用作由 .NET Framework XAML 服务实现的其他 XAML 读取器的基类。This class is not used as a base class by other XAML readers that are implemented by .NET Framework XAML Services. 相反，它由读取器（如）在内部使用，或用作特定于技术的实现（如 PresentationFramework.dll）的基类 。Instead, it is used internally for value-passing by readers such as ; or it is used as a base class for a technology-specific implementation, such as from PresentationFramework.dll.

related.span: 了解 XAML 节点流结构和概念

span.span: Understanding XAML Node Stream Structures and Concepts

summary.span: 基于 和服务提供程序提供的某些所需服务，在延迟模式下加载 XAML 内容。

span.span: Loads XAML content in a deferred mode, which is based on a and certain required services from a service provider.

returns.span: 输入 生成的根对象。

span.span: The root object that is produced by the input .

Public MustOverride Function Save (value As Object, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As XamlReader
public: abstract System::Xaml::XamlReader ^ Save(System::Object ^ value, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);
abstract member Save : obj * IServiceProvider -> System.Xaml.XamlReader

param.name: value

span.span: The input value to commit for deferred loading.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 所需服务的服务提供程序。

Commits a value for deferred loading.

returns.span: 可用于以 XAML 节点信息形式获取延迟值的 XAML 读取器。

span.span: A XAML reader that can be used to obtain the deferred value as XAML node information.
